title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When a user creates a new 'DateTime' type report parameter in the BIRT report designer and enters an invalid date string in the 'default value' field, such as '55/66/9999', the date value is not being correctly validated by the UI or Model.
EB: The UI or Model should have validated the date value and rejected it, since it is an invalid date string.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the BIRT report designer. 2. Create a new report parameter of type 'DateTime'. 3. Enter an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999', in the 'default value' field.
